image.title: Apache

item.title: Commons Attributes 2.1 Released
item.description: The Apache Commons team is happy to announce the release of Commons Attributes 2.1. This is the first release of the new Commons-Attributes code.

item.title: Cloudscape Becomes Apache Derby
item.description: IBM has submitted a proposal to the Apache DB project for a Java-based package to be called 'Derby'.
